storyText: <p>Bowser stood atop his <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ1" title="JJ1" contenteditable="false">grand</span>, lava-surrounded castle, gazing at the framed portrait of Princess Peach he kept on his bedside <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Furniture1" title="NN_Furniture1" contenteditable="false">table</span>. His massive <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart1" title="NNS_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false">claws</span> traced the edges of the frame as he sighed, steam <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBG1" title="VBG1" contenteditable="false">puffing</span> from his nostrils.</p><p>“She’s just… <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ2" title="JJ2" contenteditable="false">perfect</span>,” he muttered to himself, tail <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBG_Intransitive1" title="VBG_Intransitive1" contenteditable="false">swishing</span> behind him. “Her smile, her hair, her <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Clothing1" title="NN_Clothing1" contenteditable="false">dress</span>, her—”</p><p>A loud, <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ3" title="JJ3" contenteditable="false">deliberate</span> cough interrupted his musings. Kamek hovered nearby, adjusting his <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Clothing1" title="NNS_Clothing1" contenteditable="false">spectacles</span>. “Your Majesty, might I remind you that the princess has rejected every <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ4" title="JJ4" contenteditable="false">grand</span> romantic gesture you’ve ever attempted?”</p><p>Bowser <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Onomatopoeia1" title="VBD_Onomatopoeia1" contenteditable="false">huffed</span>. “That’s just because I haven’t found the <em>right</em> one yet. This time, she’ll see how much I <span class="placeholder" data-id="VB_Stative1" title="VB_Stative1" contenteditable="false">care</span>!”</p><p>Later that <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_TimeOfDay1" title="NN_TimeOfDay1" contenteditable="false">evening</span>, Bowser arrived at Peach’s castle in a <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ5" title="JJ5" contenteditable="false">massive</span>, flower-covered airship, flanked by legions of Koopa Troopas and <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS2" title="NNS2" contenteditable="false">Goombas</span> . The ship descended <span class="placeholder" data-id="RB1" title="RB1" contenteditable="false">gracefully</span> onto the palace grounds, and Bowser stepped forward, holding a bouquet the size of a <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN3" title="NN3" contenteditable="false">Thwomp</span>.</p><p>Peach, standing at the entrance with her <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart2" title="NNS_BodyPart2" contenteditable="false">arms</span> crossed, sighed. “Bowser, what <em>is</em> this?”</p><p>“A <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ6" title="JJ6" contenteditable="false">grand</span> declaration of love!” Bowser boomed, spreading his arms wide. “I’ve written you a poem, forged a <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ7" title="JJ7" contenteditable="false">golden</span> statue in your honor, and I even—”</p><p>“Bowser.” Peach <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Transitive1" title="VBD_Transitive1" contenteditable="false">pinched</span> the bridge of her nose. “I’m flattered. <span class="placeholder" data-id="RB2" title="RB2" contenteditable="false">Really</span>. But for the <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ_Number1" title="JJ_Number1" contenteditable="false">hundredth</span> time… no.”</p><p>Bowser’s grin faltered. “But why? I’m strong, I'm <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ8" title="JJ8" contenteditable="false">brave</span>, I have my own kingdom, I—”</p><p>“<span class="placeholder" data-id="Exclamation1" title="Exclamation1" contenteditable="false">Exclamation</span>, you kidnapped me <em>again</em> last week.”</p><p>“That was a misunderstanding!”</p><p>“You locked me in a <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN4" title="NN4" contenteditable="false">cage</span>.”</p><p>“For <em><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Abstract1" title="NN_Abstract1" contenteditable="false">safety</span>!</em>”</p><p>Peach sighed, rubbing her <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart3" title="NNS_BodyPart3" contenteditable="false">temples</span>. “Bowser, you’re just <em>not</em> my type. I don’t know how to make this <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJR1" title="JJR1" contenteditable="false">clearer</span>.”</p><p>Bowser deflated <span class="placeholder" data-id="RB3" title="RB3" contenteditable="false">slightly</span>, shoulders slumping. “Not even a <em>little</em> bit?”</p><p>“No.”</p><p>Kamek floated up <span class="placeholder" data-id="IN1" title="IN1" contenteditable="false">beside</span> Bowser, patting him on the <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BodyPart1" title="NN_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false">shoulder</span>. “Come on, Your Majesty. Let’s go home.”</p><p>Bowser <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Movement1" title="VBD_Movement1" contenteditable="false">shuffled</span> back to the airship, tossing the bouquet over the side. A Chain Chomp <span class="placeholder" data-id="RB4" title="RB4" contenteditable="false">happily</span> caught it in its jaws. As the airship ascended, he cast one <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ9" title="JJ9" contenteditable="false">last</span> , longing look at the princess below.</p><p>“Maybe next time…” he <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Communication1" title="VBD_Communication1" contenteditable="false">murmured</span>.</p><p>Peach <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Transitive2" title="VBD_Transitive2" contenteditable="false">rolled</span> her eyes and walked back inside, already forgetting the <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ10" title="JJ10" contenteditable="false">whole</span> ordeal.</p>

Do you think your <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_FamilyMember1" title="NNS_FamilyMember1" contenteditable="false">children</span> are too into Brain rot? Do you <span class="placeholder" data-id="VB_Stative1" title="VB_Stative1" contenteditable="false">hate</span> the word Skibidi toilet? Then come on down to <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Peter</span>'s Brain rot Brawl, the number <span class="placeholder" data-id="Number1" title="Number1" contenteditable="false">1</span> place to cure your <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_FamilyMember1" title="NNS_FamilyMember1" contenteditable="false">children</span>'s Brain rot! The first thing you need to do is learn your <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_FamilyMember1" title="NNS_FamilyMember1" contenteditable="false">children</span>'s hobbies! Weather its <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Job1" title="NN_Job1" contenteditable="false">YouTube</span> or <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Job2" title="NN_Job2" contenteditable="false">Roblox</span>, we love all of your hobbies! Next up, <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false">Mr Beast</span> Has to grab a bar of <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN3" title="NN3" contenteditable="false">soap</span> to wipe out the Brian rot. and then you're done! The bill is <span class="placeholder" data-id="Number2" title="Number2" contenteditable="false">300</span> dollars, so if want to do this, come down <span class="placeholder" data-id="Date1" title="Date1" contenteditable="false">this weekend</span>!

"Time to go to <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN1" title="NN1" contenteditable="false">bed</span>!" spoke <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Sally</span>. <span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false">her</span> brother was in the bathroom getting ready to <span class="placeholder" data-id="VB_Intransitive1" title="VB_Intransitive1" contenteditable="false">sleep</span>. First, he brushed his <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart1" title="NNS_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false">teeth</span>. Then he spat out the remains of his <span class="placeholder" data-id="Liquid1" title="Liquid1" contenteditable="false">toothpaste</span>. <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Sally</span> did the same thing, except <span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false">her</span> flavor was <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Food1" title="NN_Food1" contenteditable="false">mint</span>  instead of <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Food2" title="NN_Food2" contenteditable="false">strawberry</span>, which <span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false">her</span> brother used. Meanwhile, the brother went to the <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_RoomInHouse1" title="NN_RoomInHouse1" contenteditable="false">bathroom</span> and had to go number <span class="placeholder" data-id="Number1" title="Number1" contenteditable="false">two</span>. Finally, they put on <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Clothing1" title="NNS_Clothing1" contenteditable="false">pajamas</span>. They fell <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ1" title="JJ1" contenteditable="false">asleep</span>  in an instant!

This story begins {Number1} {NNS_UnitOfTime1} ago in a faraway land called {NN_Place1}.  A {NN_Animal1} named {NN_Person1} was {VBG_Movement1} through the jungle when he {RB1} came across a pair of {JJ1} {NNS1}. 
     "{Exclamation1}" he said to himself as he {VBD_Action1} forward to inspect them.  Suddenly, without warning, he was surrounded by {NNS_Animal1}!  He brandished his {NN1} in a {JJ2} attempt to stay safe, but he was quickly overrun and {VBD_Transitive1} by the savage {NNS_Animal1}.  

He awoke {Number2} hours later in a dark place. 
     "Where am I?" he asked to the darkness. No response. {RB2}, he felt around and grasped something {JJ3}. As his eyes adjusted to the darkness, he suddenly realized he was holding a {NN2}.  Feeling {JJ4} and {JJ5}, he took the {NN2} and looked for a source of {NN_Liquid1} to stay alive.  Suddenly, a sound. 
     "Relax, friend, for you are in {NN_Place2}!" Said a {JJ6} {NN_Animal2}.  {NN_Person1} gave a sigh of relief and {VBD_Transitive2} the {NN_Animal2}.
     "When I found you, you were completely covered in {NN3}," she said to him.  "I brought you here to make you better.  How are you feeling?"
     "{JJ7}," he replied.
     "Excellent! A few more {NNS_UnitOfTime2} and you should be right as {NN4}.  In the meantime, you will be safe here."
     {NN_Person1} was not listening. He was too busy thinking of the {NNS_Animal1} that {VBD_Transitive1} him and what he would have to do about it.
    "I need to get back to {NN_Place1}, at once" he said.
    "{Exclamation2}!" she said. "You can't go back there, it's not safe!"
    "I must," he said.  "But I need training. Otherwise I'll be like a {NN5} out there.
     "Very well," the {NN_Animal2} replied.  "I can teach you the ways of the {NN6}, an ancient fighting technique founded by {NN_Person3}.  It will take you many {NNS_UnitOfTime3} to master it, but it can be done."
     "Very well," said {NN_Person1}.
     
So it began. {NN_Person1} became the {NN_Person2}'s {NN7}, and over those {NNS_UnitOfTime3} he learned to have the {NN_Abstract1} of a {NN8}, the {NN_Abstract2} of a {NN9}, and the {NN_Abstract3} of a {NN10}. 

{NN_Person1} the {NN_Animal1} was nearly ready.

     On the day that he left {NN_Place2}, the {NN_Animal2} said to him, " I have one last lesson to teach you. It is known as the {JJ8} {NN11}. Use this, and you will be unmatched."
     "Teach me the {JJ8} {NN11} so that I may {VB_Transitive1} those who dare cross me," he said.
     "Very well. Take this {NN12}."
     "A {NN12}? Are you serious?"
     "Of course! Now, while {VBG_Transitive1} the {NN12}, {VB1} as {RB3} as you can while shouting, "{Exclamation3}!"
     {NN_Person1} tried as his master taught, and as he did, a sudden {NN13} erupted from his {NN_BodyPart} and {VBD_Movement1} across the room.
     "Wow," {NN_Person1} said.
     "Now," said the {NN_Animal2}, "you are ready."

TO BE CONTINUED

CHAPTER 1: 
     "<span class="placeholder" data-id="Exclamation1" title="Exclamation1" contenteditable="false">I can't believe it</span>, we finally made it! Land ho!"<div>Christopher Columbus looked up from his book, "<span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BookTitle1" title="NN_BookTitle1" contenteditable="false">Star Navigation For Dummies</span>", and sighed. This was the <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJS_Ordinal1" title="JJS_Ordinal1" contenteditable="false">fourth</span> time he had been told they had reached <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Place1" title="NN_Place1" contenteditable="false">India</span>, and every time it was just another <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ4" title="JJ4" contenteditable="false">worthless</span> island.  The Santa <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Maria</span> was growing weaker by the <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_UnitOfTime1" title="NN_UnitOfTime1" contenteditable="false">day</span>, and the men were getting <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ3" title="JJ3" contenteditable="false">tired</span>.  They needed some good news.</div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Give me that," he said, taking the </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN2" title="NN2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spyglass</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> from the ship hand and peering through it. It was hard to see through the thick </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN3" title="NN3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">fog</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, but there indeed appeared to be land ahead.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Well I'll be a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Animal1" title="NN_Animal1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">monkey</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">'s </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_FamilyMember1" title="NN_FamilyMember1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">uncle</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, you may be right. All hands starboard, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number1" title="Number1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">3</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  o'clock!" </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Do you really think it could be <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Place1" title="NN_Place1" contenteditable="false">India</span>?" asked the ship hand.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"I don't know, but my </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BodyPart1" title="NN_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">gut</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  tells me that this could finally be our destination.  Let's send out Captain </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  and </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  team to see what they find. If we succeed at this, we'll be the most lucrative traders of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS1" title="NNS1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spice</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  in the world!"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The sun set by the time they anchored offshore.  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Animal1" title="NNS_Animal1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">crabs</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> could be seen </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBG_Movement1" title="VBG_Movement1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">skittering</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  along the beach, staying just out of their reach.  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  and </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  crew of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number2" title="Number2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">twelve</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> rowed ashore and set into the wilderness.  The team immediately felt </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ5" title="JJ5" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">nervous</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Captain, I have a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ_Emotion1" title="JJ_Emotion1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">bad</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"></span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">feeling about this place. The air smells <span class="placeholder" data-id="JJR1" title="JJR1" contenteditable="false">fouler</span> than usual."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Quiet, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">!" the captain seethed back.  The captain seemed to know more than </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  let on, but </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> brushed </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP2PSA" title="PRP2PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">her</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  thoughts aside and continued </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBG2" title="VBG2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">exploring</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.
     They made camp that night and quickly lit a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN4" title="NN4" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">fire</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> to stay warm.  The captain retreated to </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  tent early while the rest of the crew </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD1" title="VBD1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">drank</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  late into the night.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">No one seemed to notice the </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number3" title="Number3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">three</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> pairs of eyes reflected from within the trees.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Morning came, and as the captain emerged from </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  tent, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  approached </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1OBJ" title="PRP1OBJ" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">him</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="RB1" title="RB1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">hastily</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Captain, we've noticed something... Unusual.  You may want to see this yourself." </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Very well," said <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false">Dennis</span> </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">. </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"></span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> took </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> across the camp, and immediately the captain knew what</span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  was talking about. On the ground were footprints, too </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ6" title="JJ6" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">large</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  to be theirs, with </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number4" title="Number4" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">six</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  toes on each foot.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Commander Columbus never said anything about this," <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Fred</span>  said with a hint of <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Emotion1" title="NN_Emotion1" contenteditable="false">doubt</span>. </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> "Do you think that maybe this isn't </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Place1" title="NN_Place1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">India</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> </span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> after all?"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Go back to your tent," said </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Dennis</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.  "Prepare the crew and be ready to continue as planned." </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"But sir, I-" </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"THAT IS AN ORDER."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Very well, sir, but with all due respect, I think we need to be more </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ7" title="JJ7" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">prudent</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  about this.  We can be ready in </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number5" title="Number5" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">ten</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_UnitOfTime1" title="NNS_UnitOfTime1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">minutes</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Do it," the captain </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Communication1" title="VBD_Communication1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">commanded</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false">Dennis</span> looked down at the footprint as </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Fred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  walked away, and when </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  knew </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP2SUB" title="PRP2SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">she</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  was out of earshot, </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  said quietly:</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"You can't stop me. I will </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBP_Transitive1" title="VBP_Transitive1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">destroy</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  you and I will take what's mine." </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1SUB" title="PRP1SUB" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">he</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  wiped away the footprints and went back to camp, hiding </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="PRP1PSA" title="PRP1PSA" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">his</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Abstract1" title="NN_Abstract1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">intent</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Back on the ship, the mood was </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ8" title="JJ8" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">tense</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.  The men on deck waited with </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ9" title="JJ9" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">bated</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  breath while the crew below were discussing what they would do when they discovered the source of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS1" title="NNS1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spice</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">One said: "When I get home, I'm gonna </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VB_Transitive1" title="VB_Transitive1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">kiss</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  my girl and marry her."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Another said: "I'll share the money! What could I possibly do with more than </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number6" title="Number6" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">a hundred</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  gold anyway?"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"And what about you, Commander?" asked one.  "What will you do when you're richer than even a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Career1" title="NN_Career1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Lord</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">?"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Christopher Columbus stared at his </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Food1" title="NNS_Food1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">crab meat</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  and contemplated the question.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"All my life I've considered what I would do with such wealth. When I was a child, I always wanted to be an </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Career2" title="NN_Career2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">archeologist</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, and that is still a possibility. But I don't know if I could ever leave the sea. It's in my </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BodyPart2" title="NN_BodyPart2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">blood</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  now."</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The men sat in </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Abstract2" title="NN_Abstract2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">silence</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, waiting to hear more.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">"Also, I've always wanted to take ownership of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNP1" title="NNP1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The Isle of Man</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, so I might do that. And I'd start taking </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Activity1" title="NN_Activity1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">archery</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> lessons.  That is what I will do when we find our </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS1" title="NNS1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spice</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">." </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> Suddenly, there was a thud overhead. Instantly the men stood up and ran to the deck as </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="RB2" title="RB2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">quickly</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  as they could.  What they saw would haunt them to this </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_UnitOfTime2" title="NN_UnitOfTime2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">day</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">.</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">The steersman lay dead on the floor. He was pinned to the deck up by a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN5" title="NN5" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spear</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  which had been pierced straight into him.  His </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_BodyPart3" title="NN_BodyPart3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spinal fluid</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  had splattered all over the deck and left a </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ10" title="JJ10" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">metallic</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  odor. </span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"> "To your positions, men!" cried Christopher Columbus as he unsheathed his </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN6" title="NN6" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">sword</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">. "Protect the Santa </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">Maria</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">!"</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">It was too late, however. As he looked around him, he saw it all.  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="Number7" title="Number7" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">a dozen</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ_Color1" title="JJ_Color1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">dark</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  men, wearing nothing but </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Clothing1" title="NNS_Clothing1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">loincloths</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, completely surrounding him and his crew and brandishing their </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN5" title="NN5" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">spear</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">s  over their heads, a clear look of </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Abstract3" title="NN_Abstract3" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">aggression</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  in their eyes.
    Christopher considered the lives of his men, his hopes and their dreams, and </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD_Communication2" title="VBD_Communication2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">said</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">, "We surrender. Take us to your leader so we may </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="VB_Transitive2" title="VB_Transitive2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">discuss</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  the situation with them."
    The </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="JJ_Color1" title="JJ_Color1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">dark</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  men tied their </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart1" title="NNS_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">hands</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  behind their </span><span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart2" title="NNS_BodyPart2" contenteditable="false" style="font-size: 0.875rem;">backs</span><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">  and led them to the boats.</span></div><div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 0.875rem;">TO BE CONTINUED...</span></div></div>

Once upon a time there was a girl named Carol. She was a greedy girl that was always into money and cookies. She owned her own business to get money and payed little of it to her employee, who was Soda Pop<span style="font-size: 0.875rem; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">.</span><div><div>    Suddenly, the door busted open and Scientist came in, saying “Merry Christmas!” </div><div>    Carol was angry by her disruptive behavior and said, “Would you be quiet while my employee works!?” She got down from her stool and said, “Such Disobedient Behavior! You should feel bad young lady!”</div></div><div>    Scientist shrugged and said, “Okay, but have a merry Christmas and happy new year!” She closed the door behind her.</div><div>    Carol yawned and said, “well, glad we got that out of the way,” Soda pop was seeming like she wanted to say something. Carol rolled her eyes and said, “what do you want!?”</div><div>    Soda pop gulped and said, “Carol, since tomarrow is Christmas, can I have the day off?” Carol muttered something about “bah humbug” under her breath. Soda pop was worried.</div><div>    Carol said, “fine, but only half of the day off! And this will come into your paycheck!” Soda pop didn’t seem to mind. “You remember that fateful day when I gave you 20 coins a week instead of ten?"</div><div>    "Yes! I also had to do your laundry!"</div><div>    "Opp, time for you to go. Have a," she shuddered at the thought, then gritted her teeth and said, "Merry Christmas."</div><div>     Soda pop gleefully left, leaving Carol to say, "Good riddance." She looked at the sign at the top of the shop, wish said, "Carol and Rien's Writing Workshop!" There were scribbled out words that originally said, "Happy Holidays!"</div><div>     Carol went home in her luxury mansion. It was late, and she was tired. She was going to fall asleep when suddenly, "ooooh!!!!" Carol got scared and hid under a blanket. "Who's there?" Then someone said, "It's me, Rien!" A ghost appeared which looked like Rein, Carol's sister. "I was stuck in this ghostly form for years, and now I can talk to you! I do not like what you've become, Carol, so tonight, three ghosts will show you what you were, what you are, and what you will be!"</div><div>     Carol said, "okay! Just Please leave me alone!</div>

storyTitle: A Maybe Tower Heroes Christmas Carol
storyText: Once upon a time there was a girl named <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> . She was a greedy girl that was always into money and cookies. She owned her own business to get money and played little of it to her employee, who was<span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Soda Pop</span> <span style="font-size: 0.875rem; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;">.</span><div><div>    Suddenly, the door busted open, and <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false">Scientist</span> came in, saying “Merry <span class="placeholder" data-id="Holiday1" title="Holiday1" contenteditable="false">Christmas</span> !” </div><div>    <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> was angry by her disruptive behavior and said, “Would you be quiet while my employee works!?” She got down from her<span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Concrete2" title="NN_Concrete2" contenteditable="false">stool</span> and said, “Such Disobedient Behavior! You should feel bad young lady!”</div></div><div>    <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person2" title="NN_Person2" contenteditable="false">Scientist</span> shrugged and said, “Okay, but have a merry <span class="placeholder" data-id="Holiday1" title="Holiday1" contenteditable="false">Christmas</span> and happy new year!” She closed the <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Concrete1" title="NN_Concrete1" contenteditable="false">door</span> behind her.</div><div>    <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD1" title="VBD1" contenteditable="false">yawned</span> and said, “well, glad we got that out of the way,” <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Soda Pop</span> was seeming like she wanted to say something. Carol rolled her <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart1" title="NNS_BodyPart1" contenteditable="false">eyes</span> and said, “what do you want!?”</div><div>   <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Soda Pop</span> <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBD2" title="VBD2" contenteditable="false">gulped</span> and said, “Carol, since tomorrow is <span class="placeholder" data-id="Holiday1" title="Holiday1" contenteditable="false">Christmas</span> , can I have the day off?” <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> muttered something about “<span class="placeholder" data-id="Exclamation1" title="Exclamation1" contenteditable="false">bah humbug</span> ” under her breath. <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Soda Pop</span> was worried.</div><div>    <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> said, “fine, but only half of the day off! And this will come into your paycheck!” <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Soda Pop</span> didn’t seem to mind. “You remember that fateful day when I gave you <span class="placeholder" data-id="Number1" title="Number1" contenteditable="false">20</span> coins a week instead of <span class="placeholder" data-id="Number2" title="Number2" contenteditable="false">10</span> ?"</div><div>    "Yes! I also had to do your <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Concrete1" title="NNS_Concrete1" contenteditable="false">laundry</span> !"</div><div>    "Opp, time for you to go. Have a," she shuddered at the thought, then gritted her<span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_BodyPart2" title="NNS_BodyPart2" contenteditable="false">teeth</span> and said, "Merry <span class="placeholder" data-id="Holiday1" title="Holiday1" contenteditable="false">Christmas</span> ."</div><div>     <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person3" title="NN_Person3" contenteditable="false">Soda Pop</span> <span class="placeholder" data-id="RB1" title="RB1" contenteditable="false">gleefully</span> left, leaving <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> to say, "Good riddance." She looked at the sign at the top of the shop, wish said, "<span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> and <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person4" title="NN_Person4" contenteditable="false">Rien</span> 's Writing Workshop!" There were scribbled out words that originally said, "<span class="placeholder" data-id="HolidayExclamation1" title="HolidayExclamation1" contenteditable="false">Happy Holidays</span> !"</div><div>     <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> went home in her luxury mansion. It was late, and she was tired. She was going to fall asleep when suddenly, "<span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Onomatopoeia1" title="NN_Onomatopoeia1" contenteditable="false">ooooh</span> !!!!" <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> got scared and hid under a <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Concrete3" title="NN_Concrete3" contenteditable="false">blanket</span> . "Who's there?" Then someone said, "It's me, <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person4" title="NN_Person4" contenteditable="false">Rien</span> !" A ghost appeared which looked like<span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person4" title="NN_Person4" contenteditable="false">Rien</span> , <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Place1" title="NN_Place1" contenteditable="false">Carol's</span>'s sister. "I was stuck in this ghostly form for years, and now I can <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBP_Communication1" title="VBP_Communication1" contenteditable="false">talk</span> to you! I do not like what you've become, <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> , so tonight, <span class="placeholder" data-id="Number3" title="Number3" contenteditable="false">3</span> ghosts will show you what you were, what you are, and what you will be!"</div><div>     <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> said, "okay! Just Please leave me alone!"</div><div>     The ghost vanished in thin air.</div><div>     Carol sighed and said, "okay, three ghosts, I just hope they aren't too bad."</div><div>     There suddenly was a <span class="placeholder" data-id="NNS_Onomatopoeia1" title="NNS_Onomatopoeia1" contenteditable="false">whoosh</span> noise and <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> looked to see a <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person5" title="NN_Person5" contenteditable="false">wizard</span> of some kind. "Hello there, <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> ," The <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person5" title="NN_Person5" contenteditable="false">wizard</span> said. "I am the ghost of the past and I will show what you were." Suddenly, the <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Concrete4" title="NN_Concrete4" contenteditable="false">floor</span> fell, and <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person1" title="NN_Person1" contenteditable="false">Carol</span> landed outside, and through the window was her with <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person4" title="NN_Person4" contenteditable="false">Rien</span> , <span class="placeholder" data-id="VBG_Action1" title="VBG_Action1" contenteditable="false">dancing</span> . Carol smiled and said, "good times!"</div><div>     The <span class="placeholder" data-id="NN_Person5" title="NN_Person5" contenteditable="false">wizard</span> was not happy though, and she said, "when you got your job in collecting cookies and coins, she left you," and they teleported to Carol's workshop from the past. The younger Carol was counting her coins when Rien said, "my love, when are we going to go on our honeymoon? It's been years, and you have saved up money!" But carol shooed her away and said, "maybe another time."</div><div>     Wizard glared at the real Carol and said, "You had sent her to jail because you framed her for crimes you committed! I am done with you for now, but the ghost of present will arrive in 1 hour."</div><div>     Wizard disappeared, and Carol was in shock. But for now, she got a little bit of sleep, waiting for the ghost of present to come.</div><div>     Suddenly, A door banged! She went downstairs and saw Branch, who was so tall that she reached the roof! Branch said, "Today, we will look at what is happening at your worker's house, you know, soda pop."</div><div>     They traveled to soda pop house, which looked tiny compared to the other house. Branch said, "Now tell me what you see?"</div><div>     Carol looked in and soda pop and Yasuke, cooking a small dinner. There was barely enough food for everyone. Carol pointed out, "Hey! Theres more stuff cooking over there! In the pot above the fire!" But branch shook her head and said, "Thats your laundry."</div><div>     Carol said, "oh." Then suddenly she started getting lifted into the air, where she ended up in a graveyard. There was another ghost, what she assumed was the ghost of the future, but it looked way different. She was creepy, and noticed that her name was, Maitake. "Hello?" said Carol, but she didn't respond. Suddenly, she noticed that there was a grave for someone named, yellow yasuke. She realized it was one of their kids! Carol pleaded to the ghost, "Please, I'm sorry! Please! I'll turn my life around!" Miatake started to grab a potion from her pocket and threw it at her. It made carol dizzy.</div><div>     She suddenly woke up, to find it was Christmas day! She jumped with joy and got her money bag! She went over to Soda pop's house and pretended to be rough and tough. She knocked at the door and soda pop said, "CAROL!! I mean, uhhhh, what are you doing here?" Then Carol said, "I'm here to give you a raise! You will live happily ever after! And that is what happened.</div><div>      THE END... FOR NOW</div>
